GSD.description:
xen/netfront: harden netfront against event channel storms

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.168 by commit 3e68d099f09c260a7dee28b99af02fe6977a9e66. For more details please see the references link.
